company_profile.name: GrowthForge
company_profile.description: GrowthForge is a performance marketing agency exclusively serving B2B SaaS companies in the $1M-$20M ARR range. We run full-funnel demand generation — from LinkedIn ads and cold email to SEO content and webinar funnels — with a unique 'pay for pipeline' model where 40% of our fee is tied to qualified pipeline generated.

facts.label: Core Service
facts.value: Full-funnel demand gen for B2B SaaS: LinkedIn ads, cold email, SEO content, webinar funnels

facts.label: Differentiator
facts.value: Pay-for-pipeline model: 40% of fee tied to qualified pipeline generated

facts.label: Market Size
facts.value: B2B marketing services market is $76B globally, SaaS-focused segment ~$8B

facts.label: Primary Buyer
facts.value: CMO or VP Marketing at SaaS companies doing $1M-$20M ARR with 2-5 person marketing team

facts.label: Current Revenue
facts.value: $2.4M revenue, 18 active clients, 94% retention rate over 12 months

facts.label: Agency Landscape
facts.value: Most agencies charge retainers with no accountability — clients are tired of paying for activity not results

facts.label: Pricing Model
facts.value: Base retainer $8K-15K/month + 40% performance bonus tied to qualified pipeline

facts.label: Reputation
facts.value: Known in SaaS Twitter circles for transparent reporting and pipeline attribution

icps.name: SaaS CMO / VP Marketing

demographics.role: CMO / VP Marketing / Head of Growth

psychographics.beliefs: Marketing should be measured by pipeline and revenue, not vanity metrics
psychographics.identity: Revenue-focused marketer who speaks the language of the C-suite
psychographics.fears: Getting fired because marketing can't prove ROI to the board
triggers: missed pipeline targets for 2 consecutive quarters
board pressure to show marketing ROI
in-house team is maxed out and can't scale channels
previous agency delivered vanity metrics not pipeline

painPoints: Previous agencies charged $15K/month retainers and delivered blog posts nobody read
In-house team of 2-3 can't run LinkedIn ads + cold email + SEO + webinars simultaneously
Can't prove to the CEO that marketing spend turns into pipeline
Every agency pitch sounds the same — no one puts skin in the game
goals: Generate $500K+ in qualified pipeline per quarter from outbound + inbound
Have a marketing partner who is accountable to pipeline, not just deliverables
Scale demand gen across 3+ channels without hiring 5 more people
Get attribution clarity so the board sees marketing as a revenue center
objections: We've been burned by agencies before — why are you different?
The pay-for-pipeline model sounds great but how do you define 'qualified'?
Can you actually handle our technical SaaS content?
What happens if you don't hit pipeline targets — do we still pay the base?

positioning.uvp: GrowthForge is the only B2B SaaS marketing agency where 40% of our fee is tied to the qualified pipeline we generate — because if we don't drive results, we don't deserve to get paid.
differentiators: Pay-for-pipeline model: 40% performance fee tied to qualified pipeline
SaaS-only focus: we speak your language, know your metrics, understand your buyer
Full-funnel execution: LinkedIn ads + cold email + SEO + webinars under one roof
Transparent attribution: real-time dashboard showing every dollar to pipeline

competitors.name: WebFX
weaknesses: Retainer model with no performance tie

messaging.oneLiner: GrowthForge: The SaaS marketing agency that only wins when you do.
messaging.positioningStatement: For SaaS CMOs who are tired of paying agencies for activity instead of results, GrowthForge is the performance marketing agency that ties 40% of its fee to qualified pipeline generated — unlike traditional agencies that charge flat retainers regardless of outcome.

valueProps.title: Skin in the Game
valueProps.description: 40% of our fee is a performance bonus tied to qualified pipeline. If we don't deliver, we don't get paid in full.

valueProps.title: SaaS-Native Execution
valueProps.description: We only serve B2B SaaS. We know your metrics, your buyer journey, and your board's expectations.

valueProps.title: Full-Funnel Under One Roof
valueProps.description: LinkedIn ads, cold email, SEO content, and webinar funnels — all coordinated, all attributed, all in one dashboard.

doList: Lead with pipeline numbers and client results
Use specific SaaS metrics (ARR, pipeline, CAC)
Share real client case studies with permission
dontList: Don't use agency jargon like 'ideation' or 'synergistic'
Don't trash other agencies by name

soundbites: We eat what we kill. 40% of our fee depends on your pipeline.
Your last agency gave you blog posts. We give you pipeline.
We don't do 'brand awareness.' We do 'board-ready pipeline reports.'
guardrails: Always quantify claims with real numbers
Never promise specific pipeline numbers before discovery
Position as partner not vendor — we succeed together or not at all
